scripts.generate: dfx generate && mkdir -p apps/site/src/backend && cp ./src/declarations/strike_backend/strike_backend.did.js ./src/declarations/strike_backend/strike_backend.did.d.ts apps/site/src/backend/
scripts.extract: cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --package strike_backend && candid-extractor target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/strike_backend.wasm > strike_backend.did && cp strike_backend.did canisters/strike_backend/strike_backend.did
